navigation.odometry
Class Odometer

java.lang.Object
  navigation.odometry.Odometer
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class Odometer
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable

Keeps track of the position and orientation of the robot. Coordinate system used: 0 degrees faces towards the positive y-axis. Positive angle is clockwise. Range: [0, 359] in degrees

Author:
Gregory Brookes
